alert.note: Alert for Blue Earth; Waseca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 9:31PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Blue Earth and southwestern Waseca Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 931 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mapleton, or 11 miles south of Mankato, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mapleton around 935 PM CDT. Pemberton around 945 PM CDT. Waldorf around 1000 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
